about_the_game:
What can you expect to see in this demo?

This demo will provide players with a basic pre-release idea of how Shrieking Darkness will look upon full release. This demo looks into the following features:
- Graphics
- Core Gameplay (inventory management, movement, and audio design)
- Narrative
- Configuration and modification.

Why bother with a demo?

We want users to decide whether or not Shrieking Darkness is the game for them or not. This may only be a short, insignificant demonstration however it still illustrates to the player what they should expect from a gameplay perspective in the full game.

content_descriptors.notes:
Realistic bloodshed.
Realistic violence.
No profanity.
